name: Azure Infrastructure Automation with Terraform and Ansible
description: Designed and implemented an optimized Azure infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible, provisioning Linux and Windows VMs, load balancing, and database services.

name: Book Review Web App
description: Deployed a Django application on AWS with Docker and AWS RDS Postgres. Integrated robust CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and SonarQube.

name: End-to-End ML Pipeline on AWS SageMaker
description: Developed a Machine Learning pipeline using AWS SageMaker for model provisioning and scaling, including preprocessing, training, and deployment.
